ClientPackage.Controller

Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientPackage.Controller.ClientController

  • public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manage event and transaction with server. Is the controller in MVC pattern. This is the class that performs the logical part in the client. Created by Emanuele on 09/05/2016.
